name: Animal Dash
description:
Hello everyone. This is a small game i ' ve been creating in my spare time.

its very simillar to an endless runner although i plan to make levels with increasing difficulty. The character must dash left and right to avoid the various obstacles while collecting apples (coins).

the current very early state of the game only features 1 level and the main menu. Future builds of the game will include more characters and diffrent levels. 

intstructions : 

Swipe Left and right to avoid obstacles. Move close to the warning signs to avoid incoming trucks.

i hope you can get a few minutes worth of fun out of this any kind of feedback would be appreciated.
